When you speak with the voice of the King of the World, all creatures around you tremble.

Alternative Reward: Sorcerer-King'S Boon - Uncommon

Properties:

  • Whenever you hit a target with a power that pushes the target, you can push the target 1 extra square.
  • Whenever you hit a target with a thunder power, the target is deafened (save ends).

Power âœ¦ Daily (Standard Action)

Effect: Make an attack: Close blast 3 (creatures in blast): level + 2 vs. Fortitude; Hit: 1d6 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 1 square and deafened (save ends).

Level 16: Close blast 3 (creatures in blast): level + 4 vs. Fortitude; Hit: 2d6 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares and deafened (save ends).

Level 26: Close blast 5 (creatures in blast): level + 6 vs. Fortitude; Hit: 2d6 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares and deafened (save ends).
